verses.verse: <S%H4194>Dead<s%> <S%H2070>flies<s%> cause the <S%H8081>oil<s%> of the <S%H7543>perfumer<s%> to send <S%H5042>forth<s%> an evil <S%H887>odor;<s%> so does a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H5531>folly<s%> <S%H3368>outweigh<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H3519>honor.<s%>
A wise <S%H2450>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> is at his right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> but a <S%H3684>fool<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> at his <S%H8040>left.<s%>

Yes <S%H5530>also,<s%> when the fool <S%H1980>walks<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> his <S%H3820>understanding<s%> <S%H2638>fails<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and he says to everyone that he is a <S%H5530>fool.<s%>

If the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H4910>ruler<s%> rises <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3240>you,<s%> don't leave your <S%H4725>place;<s%> for <S%H4832>gentleness<s%> <S%H3240>lays<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> offenses to <S%H2399>rest.<s%>

There <S%H3426>is<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> the sort of <S%H7684>error<s%> which <S%H3318>proceeds<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H7989>ruler.<s%>
<S%H5529>Folly<s%> is <S%H5414>set<s%> in <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4791>dignity,<s%> and the <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> in a low <S%H8216>place.<s%>
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> like <S%H5650>servants<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He who <S%H2658>digs<s%> a <S%H1475>pit<s%> may <S%H5307>fall<s%> into <S%H6555>it;<s%> and whoever breaks through a <S%H1447>wall<s%> may be <S%H5391>bitten<s%> by a <S%H5175>snake.<s%>
Whoever carves <S%H5265>out<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> may be <S%H6087>injured<s%> by <S%H1234>them.<s%> Whoever splits <S%H6086>wood<s%> may be endangered <S%H5533>thereby.<s%>

If the <S%H1270>axe<s%> is <S%H6949>blunt,<s%> and one <S%H7043>doesn't<s%> sharpen the <S%H6440>edge,<s%> then he must <S%H1396>use<s%> more <S%H2428>strength;<s%> but <S%H2451>skill<s%> <S%H3787>brings<s%> <S%H3504>success.<s%>
If the <S%H5175>snake<s%> <S%H5391>bites<s%> before it is <S%H3908>charmed,<s%> then is there no <S%H3504>profit<s%> for the <S%H3956>charmer<s%>'s tongue.
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a wise <S%H2450>man<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are <S%H2580>gracious;<s%> but a <S%H3684>fool<s%> is <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> by his own <S%H8193>lips.<s%>

The <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H5531>foolishness;<s%> and the <S%H319>end<s%> of his <S%H6310>talk<s%> is <S%H7451>mischievous<s%> <S%H1948>madness.<s%>

A <S%H5530>fool<s%> also <S%H7235>multiplies<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%> <S%H120>Man<s%> <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know what will <S%H310>be;<s%> and that which will be after <S%H5046>him,<s%> who can tell him?
The <S%H5999>labor<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H3021>wearies<s%> every one of <S%H3045>them;<s%> for he doesn't know how to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
<S%H337>Woe<s%> to <S%H776>you,<s%> land, when your <S%H4428>king<s%> is a <S%H5288>child,<s%> and your <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning!<s%>

<S%H835>Happy<s%> are <S%H776>you,<s%> land, when your <S%H4428>king<s%> is the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2715>nobles,<s%> and your <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> in due <S%H6256>season,<s%> for <S%H1369>strength,<s%> and not for <S%H8358>drunkenness!<s%>
By <S%H6103>slothfulness<s%> the <S%H4746>roof<s%> <S%H4355>sinks<s%> <S%H8220>in;<s%> and through idleness of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1811>leaks.<s%>
A <S%H3899>feast<s%> is <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H7814>laughter,<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> makes the life <S%H8055>glad;<s%> and <S%H3701>money<s%> is the answer for all <S%H6030>things.<s%>

<S%H7043>Don't<s%> curse the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H4093>no,<s%> not in your thoughts; and <S%H7043>don't<s%> curse the <S%H6223>rich<s%> in your <S%H2315>bedroom:<s%> for a <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> may <S%H3212>carry<s%> your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and that which <S%H1167>has<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> may <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H1697>matter.<s%>
